Welcome to cardlibrary’s documentation!¶

class cardlib.AceCard(suit: cardlib.Suit)¶

Bases: cardlib.PlayingCard

Subclass of PlayingCard which it inherits from. Subclass is the Ace card in a deck corresponding to value 14.

get_value()¶

Method of retrieving card values

Returns:

value = 14

class cardlib.Hand(cards=None)¶

Bases: object

Class that represents a player’s hand with methods that add, drop and sorting cards. It also includes a method that returns the best poker hand based on the cards on the table and the cards on the hand.

add_card(card)¶

Method that add cards to the hand

Parameters:

card –

best_poker_hand(cards)¶

Gives the best poker hand based on cards on the table and cards on the hand

Parameters:

cards – list of cards

Returns:

The hand type with it’s Enum value and a list with all the cards (cards on hand and cards on table, i.e. 7 cards)

drop_cards(indices)¶

dropping cards from the hand based on index

Parameters:

indices –

sort()¶

Sort the cards on the hand

class cardlib.HandType(value)¶

Bases: enum.Enum

Enum class that assign a value to each hand type

class cardlib.NumberedCard(value, suit)¶

Bases: cardlib.PlayingCard

Subclass of PlayingCard which it inherits from. Subclass is the numbered cards in a deck.

value

class cardlib.PlayingCard(suit: cardlib.Suit)¶

Bases: abc.ABC

Is an abstract base class, which will work as a blueprint for creating the cards.

abstract get_value()¶

Abstract method for retrieving values of cards, serves as a contract: in order to be considered a card this method must be implemented in the card.

class cardlib.PokerHand(cards: list)¶

Bases: object

Class that checks the hand type of the poker hand

static check_diff_pairs(cards)¶

Static method to check if there is a threes/two pair/pair or just a high card.

Parameters:

cards – List of cards

Returns:

HandType and list of either threes, two pair, pair and then with the considered cards in descending order if HandType is High card the list that is returned contains only cards in descending order

static check_flush(cards)¶

Static method to check if there is a flush

Parameters:

cards – List of cards

Returns:

HandType and list of the considered cards in descending order

static check_four_of_a_kind(cards)¶

Static method to check if there is a four of a kind

Parameters:

cards – List of cards

Returns:

HandType and list of the considered cards in descending order

Static method to check if there is a full house

Parameters:

cards – List of cards

Returns:

HandType and list of the considered cards in descending order

Static method to check if there is a straight

Parameters:

cards – List of cards

Returns:

HandType and list of the considered cards in descending order

cards – List of cards

class cardlib.StandardDeck¶

Bases: object

Class that creates the deck of cards containing 52 unique cards, incorporates methods for shuffling the deck and drawing cards.

draw()¶

Draws the first card of the deck.

shuffle()¶

Shuffles the deck with the shuffle function

class cardlib.Suit(value)¶

Bases: enum.Enum

Class of Enum type implemented in order to sort using the __lt__ operator
